title.rendered: KP TECHNOLOGY Galaxy A12 Case, Galaxy A12 Leather Case, Galaxy A12 Book Flip Leather Wallet Cover with Tempered Glass…

content.rendered:
Flip Wallet Case for Samsung Galaxy A12 – Card Slots – Money Compartment – Heavy Duty Protection – Magnetic Closure – Protective Stand Flip

Elegant and classy traditional case packed with options and conveniences. Made from premium high quality PU leather-based and lock stitched for a robust and aesthetic end. The inside holder is manufactured from TPU gel and matches your machine like a glove, giving nice all spherical safety.

All your gadgets’ ports, buttons and peripherals are accessible with out compromise in conjunction with the cellphone. You won’t ever have to take away your machine from the case to entry its options.

Strong magnetic closure has been carried out to securely maintain the case shut, this may maintain the case closed even when it was to take a fall, preserving your machine totally protected on this unlucky occasion.

The case additionally options inside card holders and a cash slot for holding paper foreign money. The case can be utilized to help your machine horizontally, appearing as a stand and is ideal for watching movies, films and face time.

Tempered glass display protector offers nice safety and safety for the display in your machine. It will help save on pricey display replacements. It doesn’t intervene with the performance of your display and may be very skinny at a mere 0.33mm.

After-Sales Service

We care about our valued clients, when you’ve got any questions, our devoted buyer help staff will probably be completely satisfied to assist. We endeavor to answer to all queries inside 24 hours

Make certain this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
[PERFECT FIT]: Internal gel holder is designed to suit the Galaxy A12 like a glove with correct cutouts for the digicam & button flex press safety for unrestricted entry to all of your telephones ports, buttons and peripherals.
[PROTECTION]: Ultimate 360 diploma safety For Galaxy A12 Phone Case, offering protection from knocks bumps, scratches and on a regular basis use, the holster ensures preserving your machine secure and safe alongside with further safety offered by the Tempered Glass.
[STORAGE]: Two slot card holders and cash pockets have been cleverly built-in into the within of the flip which conveniently permits you to carry playing cards, cash and receipts.
[STAND FUNCTION]: Clever horizontal viewing stand offers you the pliability to observe films or apps. While the magnetic flap closure securely holds the flip of the case in its closed place.
[COMPATIBILITY]: Compatible with Galaxy A12 solely. Please verify your cellphone mannequin inside your cellphone settings in case you are not sure. This case won’t match another mannequin however the one specified.
